message.entry: Input must be a {0} object.
Input must be a {0} or a {1} object.
Input mesh is empty.
Input must be polymesh object.
Input must be String.
Input {0} must be String.
Input must be string or an array of strings.
First input must be points of size nx3, but it is of size {0}x{1}.
Vertices must be a double or single matrix.
Input index exceeds the number of vertices.
Vertices must be an M-by-3 matrix, where M is the number of vertices in the mesh.
Triangles must be an N-by-3 or N-by-4 matrix, where N is the number of triangles in the mesh.
Input must be a finite value.
Triangles must be an N-by-3 matrix, where N is the number of triangles in the mesh.
Triangles must be an N-by-4 matrix, where N is the number of triangles in the mesh.
Triangles indices must be less than number of vertices in the mesh.
Triangle material index array should be of equal size to number of triangles.
Triangle material index should be less than number of materials in the mesh.
Triangles must be a double or Uint32 matrix.
Input index exceeds the number of triangles.
Input index exceeds the number of triangles.
Input must be a 1-by-N or N-by-1 vector, where N is the size of vector.
Input vector must be a double or Uint32 matrix.
Materials must be an N-by-1 or 1-by-N vector of strings, where N is the number of materials in the mesh.
Materials must be a string matrix.
Material named {0} already exists in the mesh at index {1,number,integer}.
Cannot remove default material with index 1.
Cannot change name of default material with index 1.
Second input must be triangles of size nx3, but it is of size {0}x{1}.
Second input must either be of length 1 or equal to length of third input.
Value of {0} exceeds maximum value of {1,number,integer}.
Unable to make graph from {0} object.
Input must be a logical scalar.
Input must be a double scalar.
Input must be a double vector of size 1-by-{0}.
Input must be a double matrix of size {0}-by-{1}.
Input file type is not supported.
Cannot read input file.
Cannot read input file.
Named parameter for polymesh constructor should be "Materials" or "FaceMaterials".
No vertex colors in the input mesh
